creditline: Gift of Stephen Addiss and Audrey Yoshiko Seo
description: three lines of bold text; three small characters above two red seals at left edge, LLQ
text:
Over the blue river, birds exceedingly white; 
On the green mountains, flowers about to blaze.
This spring we view is also passing by,
When will the time come for me to return'
title: (Quatrain by Du Fu)
